overview: I Dream Of Jo - and who wouldn't! The number one Viv Thomas model chooses her very favourite girls to work with and designs some scintillatingly sexual scenarios. Excite yourself while Jo slips into a jacuzzi with Aleska Diamond, lunches with Brandy Smile and take a hike... alone. With stunning and natural locations, I Dream Of Jo is complimented by Jo and her bevy of lesbian beauties.
title: I Dream Of Jo
